Articles.Content:
This imgur album chronicles my trip to KSC-MÃ¼n, and some of the bugs that come along with it.

This does contain spoilers about its location if you want to try to find it yourself.

Also, I believe I achieved a few firsts for precision landings on the MÃ¼n.

As a side note, that KSC will be removed in the next patch. It wasn\'t meant to be in the release.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Ha! I\'m pretty sure I was within kilometers of it on my first munar landing in 14.2. I could have gone south to explore that crater but I went north instead to explore a bunch of ridges.
